title: "Vanderbilt University Medical Center launches artificial intelligence center"
excerpt: "Vanderbilt University Medical Center has created an artificial intelligence center. The Department of Biomedical Informatics at the hospital has launched Artificial Intelligence ADVANCE (AI Discovery and Vigilance to Accelerate Innovation and Clinical Excellence), according to a press release."
